title: Bloomberg Launches Green Bond-Tilted Versions of its Flagship Fixed Income Indices - ESG Today
summary: Bloomberg launches green-tilted versions of flagship fixed income indices to promote sustainable investments, amidst a surge in green bond issuances. New products include '20% Green Bond' and '3x Green Bond Tilted' indices, offering potential additional returns for sustainability-focused investors.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 523999 - Miscellaneous Financial Investment Activities, 522320 - Financial Transactions Processing, Reserve, and Clearinghouse Activities, 523920 - Portfolio Management, 523998 - All Other Financial Investment Activities
